author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SIGNIFICANT RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE SOUTHWEST UNITED STATES THROUGH THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...SIGNIFICANT RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE SOUTHWEST UNITED STATES THROUGH THE WEEKEND... As of 2:00 PM MST Thu Oct 09 the center of Priscilla was located near 24.4, -114.9 with movement NNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 996 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
